name: Blast2DPlatformerTest
short_description:
Blast2D is going to be a 2D online multiplayer platformer shooter game for Windows, Mac, Ubuntu, Linux,
and eventually Android. Screw iOS. So far, I've coded the platformer section of the game, as well as the custom map editor.
I still have to write the projectile, the server and client, the GUI, and the particle effects. I am using
PyGame and Euclid.py . I plan to use more libraries, but that's it for the moment. 
Controls: Up, Left, Right
Custom map: To make your own map, navigate to the Blast2D install directory and locate DefaultMap.txt
            From there, write X for an empty space, # for a platform, - for a bigger platform, and O (capital o, not zero) 
            for a spawn point (useless at the moment, however)
summary: A demo of my upcoming game
